item.title: 谷歌首席执行官：如果人工智能泡沫破裂，没有公司能幸免于难
item.description: Alphabet首席执行官桑达尔-皮查伊（Sundar Pichai）表示，如果人工智能热潮崩溃，没有一家公司能幸免于难，因为人工智能行业估值飙升和大量投资加剧了人们对泡沫的担忧。【原文：Alphabet Chief Executive Sundar Pichai said no company would be unscathed if the artificial intelligence boom collapses, as soaring valuations and heavy investment in the sector fuel concerns of a bubble.】

item.title: 空中客车公司赢得迪拜航空公司 150 架喷气式飞机订单
item.description: 本周二，空中客车公司赢得了迪拜航空公司（flydubai）150架A321neo喷气机的临时订单，取代波音公司成为这家快速增长的廉价航空公司的独家供应商，并从迪拜航展的低迷开局中反弹。【原文：Airbus won a provisional order for 150 A321neo jets from flydubai on Tuesday, ousting Boeing as exclusive supplier to the fast-growing budget carrier and bouncing back from a muted start to the Dubai Airshow.】

item.title: 受 iPhone 17 需求拉动，苹果 10 月份占据中国智能手机市场 25% 的份额
item.description: 研究公司 Counterpoint 周二发布的数据显示，10 月份中国市场每售出四部智能手机中就有一部是苹果公司的 iPhone，由于 iPhone 17 系列需求强劲，销量比去年同期猛增 37%。【原文：Apple's iPhone accounted for one in every four smartphones sold in China in October, with sales jumping 37% from a year earlier on strong demand for the iPhone 17 series, data from research firm Counterpoint showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 经济增长前景改善，10 月份外国人转为亚洲债券净买家
item.description: 在经历了一个月的资金大幅流出之后，亚洲债券在 10 月份再次出现跨境资金流入，原因是地区经济增长前景的改善以及美国在东南亚签订的一系列贸易协定提振了投资者的情绪。【原文：Asian bonds witnessed renewed cross-border inflows in October following a month of sharp outflows, as an improved regional growth outlook and a series of U.S. trade agreements in Southeast Asia lifted investor sentiment.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，本田将因软件错误召回超过 25.6 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，本田将在美国召回256,603辆雅阁（Accord）混合动力汽车，原因是一个软件错误可能导致潜在的驱动力损失。【原文：Honda is recalling 256,603 Accord hybrid vehicles in the United States over a software error that may cause a potential loss of drive power, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 投资者仍然看涨，但定位是市场的逆风--美国银行调查
item.description: 美国银行周二进行的月度基金经理调查显示，全球投资者在11月份提高了股票和大宗商品的配置，但由于现金水平仅为3.7%，看涨定位现在被视为风险资产的逆风。【原文：Global investors raised equity and commodity allocations in November, but with cash levels at just 3.7%, bullish positioning is now seen as a headwind for risk assets, Bank of America's monthly fund manager survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 大科技公司主导的碳清除信用额需求加剧了供应紧张
item.description: 科技巨头对高质量碳减排信用额度的需求激增，以抵消其人工智能驱动的排放，这助长了碳减排信用额度的短缺。【原文：Surging demand for high-quality carbon removal credits from tech giants to offset their AI-driven emissions is helping fuel a shortage that experts say is exactly what is needed to spur investment in the nascent market.】

item.title: 德意志交易所将在其结算业务中加入法国兴业银行的稳定币
item.description: 德国证券交易所运营商德意志交易所（Deutsche Boerse）和法国兴业银行（Societe Generale）周二表示，两家公司计划在其结算业务中整合法国兴业银行制造的稳定币，试图让这种代币得到更广泛的使用。【原文：German stock exchange operator Deutsche Boerse plans to integrate stablecoins made by French bank Societe Generale in its settlement business, the companies said on Tuesday, in an attempt to get the tokens more widely used.】

item.title: 巴里-卡乐宝利用 NotCo 人工智能技术开发巧克力配方
item.description: 瑞士巴里-卡乐宝公司（Barry Callebaut）周二表示，该公司将与智利初创公司 NotCo AI 合作，利用人工智能开发配方，以应对可可价格高企和可可产品需求疲软的问题。【原文：Switzerland's Barry Callebaut said on Tuesday it would partner with Chilean start-up NotCo AI to utilise artificial intelligence in recipe development, as it battles high cocoa prices and weakening demand for its cocoa products.】

item.title: 海湾航空公司与波音公司签署 15 架 787 Dreamliner 飞机协议
item.description: 海湾航空公司周二发表声明说，该公司在迪拜航展上与波音公司签署了一项协议，将购买 12 至 15 架波音 787 Dreamliner 飞机。【原文：Gulf Air signed an agreement with Boeing to purchase from 12 to 15 Boeing 787 Dreamliner aircraft at the Dubai Airshow, a statement by the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 尼欧莱雅的 Firefly 电动车品牌寻求在不征收关税的右舵市场实现增长
item.description: 萤火虫（Firefly）是中国尼欧旗下的一个紧凑型电动汽车品牌，该公司正寻求在对中国电动汽车免征惩罚性关税的右舵驱动市场实现增长，并准备明年加大向这些目的地的交付力度。【原文：Firefly, a compact electric vehicle brand owned by China's Nio , is seeking growth in right-hand drive markets that are free from punitive tariffs on Chinese EVs and is preparing to ramp up deliveries to those destinations next year.】

item.title: 涂料制造商阿克苏诺贝尔将以 250 亿美元收购 Axalta Coating
item.description: 多乐士涂料生产商阿克苏诺贝尔公司周二表示，计划收购涂料生产商 Axalta Coating Systems 公司，合并后的公司企业价值将达到 250 亿美元。【原文：Dulux paint maker AkzoNobel said on Tuesday that it plans to acquire paintmaker Axalta Coating Systems in a deal that will create a combined company with an enterprise value of $25 billion.】

item.title: 随着健康趋势的高端化，雀巢的大众市场维生素失去了一些光彩
item.description: 雀巢希望退出大众维生素市场。但是，消费者对更昂贵、更有科学依据的产品的青睐，有可能使这家瑞士企业集团为其表现不佳的品牌争取高价的努力变得更加复杂。【原文：Nestle wants out of mass-market vitamins. But a move by consumers towards more expensive, science-backed products risks complicating the Swiss conglomerate's effort to fetch a high price for its underperforming brands.】

item.title: 研究显示，美国是中国贷款的最大接受国
item.description: 一项跟踪中国政府信贷活动的研究发现，中国越来越多地向高收入国家贷款，而不是发展中国家。【原文：The United States is the biggest recipient of China's lending activities globally, according to a study which tracked Beijing's credit activities and found it is increasingly lending to higher-income countries over developing countries.】

item.title: 芯片供应中断后本田北美工厂将恢复正常生产
item.description: 本田汽车公司表示，将从下周一开始逐步恢复北美汽车装配厂的正常运营，这表明因 Nexperia 芯片短缺造成的生产中断正在缓解。【原文：Honda Motor said it will begin gradually resuming normal operations at its North American vehicle assembly plants from Monday, a sign that production disruptions from a shortage of Nexperia chips are easing.】

item.title: 早间竞价恐惧和谨慎笼罩市场
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 比特币跌破 90,000 美元，显示情绪低落
item.description: 周二，比特币七个月来首次跌破 90,000 美元，这是整个金融市场投资者风险偏好正在枯竭的最新迹象。【原文：Bitcoin slipped below $90,000 for the first time in seven months on Tuesday in the latest sign that investor appetite for risk-taking is drying up across financial markets.】

item.title: 印度教育科技公司 PhysicsWallah 首日交易暴涨 45%，估值达到 50 亿美元
item.description: 由于持续增长的前景刺激了投资者的胃口，PhysicsWallah 的股票在周二的首次交易中上涨了 45%，这家印度教育科技公司的估值达到 51 亿美元。【原文：Shares of PhysicsWallah rose 45% in their trading debut on Tuesday, valuing the Indian edtech firm at $5.1 billion, as prospects for continued growth fueled investor appetite.】

item.title: 澳大利亚最大的贷款机构联邦银行称住房贷款需求过高
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）首席执行官马特-科明（Matt Comyn）周二表示，澳大利亚最大的贷款机构认为住房贷款需求过高，助推了房地产价格上涨。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia , the country's largest lender, believes demand for home loans is too high and is helping to push property prices up, Chief Executive Matt Comyn said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 香港新世界发展提前进行债券置换后将减少 13 亿美元债务
item.description: 陷入困境的新世界发展公司周二表示，在提前设定美元债券交换要约的最后期限后，预计将削减 13 亿美元的债务，其中大部分是永久债券。【原文：Embattled New World Development said on Tuesday it expected $1.3 billion of its debt, majority of it being perpetual bonds, to be cut after setting an early deadline for its dollar bond exchange offer.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 TechnologyOne 公司年度利润不及预期，股价暴跌
item.description: 本周二，TechnologyOne 公布的年度利润低于分析师预期，其股价将创下近 23 年来最糟糕的一天，原因是其向软件即服务交付模式的转变影响了近期利润率。【原文：Shares of TechnologyOne are headed for their worst day in nearly 23 years on Tuesday after reporting annual profit short of analyst expectations, as its shift to a software-as-a-service delivery model weighed on near-term margins.】

item.title: 日本央行行长将与首相高市举行首次双边会谈
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫将于周二与新任首相高市真奈举行首次双边会谈，这一备受关注的活动可能会为央行多久恢复加息周期提供暗示。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda will hold his first bilateral meeting with new Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi on Tuesday, a closely watched event that may provide hints on how soon the central bank will resume its rate-hike cycle.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，Databricks 正在商谈以 1,300 亿美元的估值进行融资
item.description: 据《The Information》周一援引两位熟悉相关讨论的人士的话报道，数据分析公司 Databricks 正在洽谈融资，估值超过 1,300 亿美元，比两个月前的上一轮融资高出约 30%。【原文：Data analytics firm Databricks is in talks to raise funds at a valuation of more than $130 billion, about 30% higher than its last financing round two months ago, The Information reported on Monday, citing two people familiar with the discussion.】

item.title: 市场关注美国一系列数据，日本首相会见日本央行行长，股市下滑
item.description: 周二亚洲股市早盘下滑，原因是金融市场正在等待因政府关门而推迟发布的大量美国关键经济数据，同时投资者放弃了对美联储下月降息的押注。【原文：Asian stocks slid in early trade on Tuesday, as financial markets waited on a rush of key U.S economic data delayed by the government shutdown while investors rolled back bets of a Federal Reserve rate cut next month.】

item.title: 在小小的圣诞岛上，谷歌推动印度洋数据中心使用可再生能源
item.description: 澳大利亚偏远的印度洋前哨圣诞岛拥有足够的电力来支持一个新的谷歌数据中心，而不会剥夺当地人的生活，但该岛最大的雇主和科技巨头表示，谷歌数据中心的到来可能会推动可再生能源的发展。【原文：Australia's remote Indian Ocean outpost of Christmas Island has enough power to support a new Google data centre without depriving locals, but its arrival could spur a push to renewable energy, the island's biggest employer and the tech giant said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯枢纽恢复装载，石油价格下跌；市场权衡制裁影响
item.description: 周二，油价下跌，原因是俄罗斯出口枢纽恢复装载（曾因乌克兰无人机和导弹袭击而短暂中断），缓解了对供应的担忧，同时交易商继续评估西方制裁对俄罗斯石油流通的影响。【原文：Oil prices dipped on Tuesday as supply concerns eased with the resumption of loadings at a Russian export hub, briefly halted by a Ukrainian drone and missile strike, while traders continued to assess the impact of Western sanctions on Russian flows.】

item.title: GlobalFoundries 收购新加坡 Advanced Micro Foundry，推动人工智能数据中心网络加速发展
item.description: 芯片制造商 GlobalFoundries 周一表示，它已经收购了 Advanced Micro Foundry（AMF），这是一家总部位于新加坡的芯片制造商，专注于硅光子学，该领域发展迅速，正被用于人工智能数据中心和量子计算机。【原文：Chip manufacturer GlobalFoundries said on Monday it has acquired Advanced Micro Foundry (AMF), a Singapore-based chipmaker that focuses on silicon photonics, a fast-growing field that is being used in artificial intelligence data centers and quantum computers.】

item.title: 交易员撤回美联储降息押注，日元处于守势，美元走强
item.description: 日元在周二的亚洲早盘交易中跌至九个多月来的最弱水平，原因是市场对美联储将在下个月的政策会议上降息的预期减弱，美元从中受益。【原文：The yen slid to its weakest level in more than nine months in early Asian trading on Tuesday as the dollar benefited from receding expectations that the Federal Reserve would cut interest rates at its policy meeting next month.】

item.title: 台湾将进一步加强两用技术出口管制
item.description: 台湾经济部表示，台湾将加强对潜在军民两用技术的出口管制，包括量子计算机和先进半导体设备，以履行其阻止武器扩散的义务。【原文：Taiwan will tighten its export controls for potential dual-use civilian-military technology to include quantum computers and advanced semiconductor equipment to fulfil its obligations to stop weapons proliferation, its economy ministry said.】

item.title: Perrier 是 "天然 "矿泉水吗？法国法院将做出裁决
item.description: 在消费者组织 UFC-Que Choisir 寻求紧急干预之后，法国一家法院将于周二就 Perrier 是否必须从货架上撤下其瓶装水做出裁决。【原文：A French court will rule on Tuesday on whether Perrier must withdraw its bottled water from shelves, after consumer group UFC-Que Choisir sought an emergency intervention over what it alleges is deceptive marketing of the brand as "natural" mineral water.】
